data.name: Alien Task Force
data.detailed_description:
HOW MANY WAVES CAN YOU SURVIVE.

Play as a mercenary whos job is to clear planets of infestations of aliens in this Third Person wave based shooter. Choose from a variety of weapons to eliminate them but be careful as you have limited ammo to survive. In this wave based game you have bosses every 10 waves. There is a shop after every wave to purchase Health, Ammo and Upgrades. It has 4 different difficulties Easy, Normal, Hard or Insane with leaderboards. So be a Victor and show everyone how far you could survive. ðŸ˜‰





All money paid into this game will be put back into it or our other projects.
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: A Sci-fi wave-based game with a variety of weapons and bosses every 10 waves. Also has a shop after every wave with health, ammo and upgrades. WASD movement and keys 1 for Blaster and 2 for Rifle.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Phenom X4 9850 or better, i5 650 or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7730 or better, GeForce GT 640 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Broadband Internet Connection Required for CO-OP.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5 6600 or equivalent, i5 6600 or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon R9 290 or better, GeForce GTX 97 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Broadband Internet Connection Required for CO-OP.

mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
